articles.author: Trisha Sengupta
articles.title: ESA shares jaw-dropping pic of ‘enigmatic’ star system: ‘Cosmic dance of fire and ice’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The European Space Agency (ESA) posted a picture of Mira HM Sge, an enigmatic star system located 3,400 light-years away. | Trending
articles.content: The European Space Agency (ESA) shared an incredible picture of a star that has left people mesmerised. Calling it the Cosmic dance of fire and ice, the agency posted a series of images which togethe… [+1693 chars]
